I. Sonnet

Frolicking rabbits amid verdant blades of grass,
Winding their way through the meadow,
In the shadow of verdant trees,
Their feet echoing the sound of the wind,
Their eyes gazing into the stars,
Their hearts beating with the rhythm of the breeze,
Their minds racing with the thoughts of the future,
Their souls singing in the sweet melody of the moonlight.
